lem.l: Nu hebbe ik volaren allent, dat yk ha&esup;n,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ok allent, dat yk gy gewan.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: My deyt not, dat yk drouich byn:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O leue sone, wor schal dyne arme moder hin?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: We helpet my, vnde we gift my ra&esup;d

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Van alle den luden, de hijr vmme sta&esup;t?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O leue kynt, schal ik nicht myt dy steruen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Men aldus yamerlyken vorderuen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So bedenke, leue sone, myn arme elende leuent!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn lijf vnde myne zele hebbe yk dy ghegheuen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Jhesus cantat et post hoc dicit ad matrem

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Mulier, ecce filius tuus!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Werde magetvnde moder myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes schal dyn hoder syn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Hebbe ene tho eneme kynde

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: -- Id wyl sik nu anders nicht vynden --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde lat dyn grote weynent syn:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dyn lydent ys my also grote pyn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar vmme byn yk van dy gebaren,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat myne vrunde nicht werden loren.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria plangit semel cum manibus, et Johannes apponit gladium Symeonis.

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owy, owe der wesselingen schicht,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De huten schut an mych!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Seed, wo dyt scharpe swerd

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dorch myne zele verd!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Et dicit eleuata facie ad filium

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Leue kynt, mynem herten ys so banghe,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde dat mot waren noch so lange, --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Och mochte yk myt dy lyden den bytteren dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn lydent ys nu mer wen to grot.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O alder leueste, yk mot nu van dy scheyden,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Sprek, leue kynt, we trostet nu vns beyden?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, leue o&esup;m myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl dy gerne horsam syn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, wij vorlesen an desser stund

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jhesum Cristum, vnser hertenallerleuesten vrund.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.p: Nota: Maria Magdalena et mater Johannis cantant vt prius planctum "O quam tristis et afflicta" sq.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Mater Johannis dicit "Ach, ach wo sere" vt prius --

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.speaker: Dominus Jhesus cantat et dicit ad Johannem

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Ecce mater tua!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Et dicit ad Johannem ricmum

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, junghere ghute,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: See nu an dyne leuen moter!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik mot nu van hynnen varen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar vmme schaltu see wol vorwaren.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik mot nu wedder keren

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Tho mynem hemmelschen vader vnde heren;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: See schal nu wesen de moder dyn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Plech erer alse myn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, do dorch dyne gote:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Nym se an dyne hode,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Troste se leflyken in erer not,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wan ik hebbe geleden den bytteren dot.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes respondet

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Here vnde meyster, dat schal my ghetemen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl se gerne to my nemen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde vor myne leuen moder vntfa&esup;n;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl se nummermer vorla&esup;n.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Gherne wyl yk se nemen an myne hute.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wat yk er ok kan do&esup;n to gute,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat wil ik van herten gerne don de wyle dat ik leue.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O leue here god, nu gheue

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vns beyden den dot,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wente yd ys vns warlyken not!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ach leyder, de spegel wyl vns entga&esup;n,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar alle de werlt kan by besta&esup;n!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: We kan nu syn trurent la&esup;n,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O hemmelsche god, van allen luden, de hijr vmme sta&esup;n?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Jhesus cantat post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Pater, dimitte eis!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Nu schal ok eyn ende syn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Der groten, bytter marter myn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O hemmelsche vader, yk bydde dy,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: An mynem ende twyde my:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vorgiff nu ghanslyk

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Den, de my so yamerlyk

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn leuent hebben ghenomen!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ende mynes leuendes ys nu ghekomen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Jhesus cantat post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Consummatum est.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Aller proheten sproke synt nu vullenbracht,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De van des mynschen sone gy worden bedacht.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Dominus Jhesus clamat valida voce dicens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: In manus tuas commendo spiritum meum.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik bevele an de hende dyn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Mynen geyst, o hemmelsche vader myn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria audiens hoc cantat valida et lacrimabili voce prosternendo se ad terram, plangendo manibus

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owy, owe, nu ys he dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria Magdalena statim leuat eam

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Sta vp, junckfrowe Maria, vnde wende dynen mo&esup;t!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dynes kyndes martere schal mennighen wesen gu&esup;d.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria cantat secundo prosternendo se ad terram, plangendo

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owy, owe, nu ys he dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Mater Johannis statim leuat cam dicens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Maria, leue suster myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Sta vp vnde lat dyngrote weynent syn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dyn scrygent vnde ok dyn weynent

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vntfarmen mach den harden steynen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria cantat tercio prosternendo se et plangendo manibus

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owy, owe, nu ys he dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes ewangelista dicit leuando eam

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Maria, nuew moder vnde leue medder myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Sta vp vnde lat dyn frote weynent syn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Yd mach nu nicht anders wesen, --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Is he dot, he mach wol wedder genesen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria plangit post hoc et vertit se ad populum

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Nu vornuwet sik myn not,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Den ik yamerlyken drage

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde so klegeliken klage.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Owe, wat heft he gedan?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Hedde gij em dat leuent la&esup;n

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde genomen myr dat lijff!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wat schal yk vyl arme wyff?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik byn syner worden anych!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes dicit

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Maria, nuwe moder vnde leue medder myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Och lat dyn grote weynent syn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Id mochte anders nicht wesen:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He moste steruen, scholde de werlt ghenesen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria cantat post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owe, weer

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Heft syn speer

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar to bereydet,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat he dich

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde mych

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So yamerlyken scheydet?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes dicit ad hoc, tenens gladium in manibus

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O Maria, dyn lydent ys alto grot,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Id maket mennigem mynschen syne oghen rot.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.p: Johannes cantat post sicut prius "Maria, moder vnde maget reyne."

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria cantat post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Nu ys ok weynent myr beschen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Went yk synen dot moet se&esup;n,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Den ik ane swere ga&esup;r

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Moder vnde maget geba&esup;r.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jhesu Criste, leue kynt, ware mynsche vnde ware god,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Du bekennest, wo grot nu ys myner zelen not

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vmme dat grote lydent dyn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde dat yk dyner mo&esup;t anych syn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria Magdalena deuote plangit post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: De sune de lyt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De steyn toryt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat laken splyt, --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wo we ys myk,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: God, vmme dyk!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De yoden bekeren sik.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De erde beuet,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De doden leuet.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt herten vnde mund

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: An desser stund,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O werde here,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wij dy danken nu so sere!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jhesu Criste, Marien kynt, o ryke god,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wat lyde wij nu vumme dynen bytteren dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O allerleueste, troste de armen kyndere dyn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Sunderges Marien, de leuen truten moder dyn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria plangit vlterius cantans

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Owe, dot

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dessen not

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Mochtestu wol wenden,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Woldestu van dyr

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Hijr to myr

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dynen baden senden!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria dicit

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Eya, eya moderlyke herte,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wat lydestu pyne vnde smerte

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vmme Jhesum Cristum, den leuen sonen myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wente yk mot nu syner anych syn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.p: Nota. Planctum sequentem beata virgo cantat bis, quia deuotissimus est, si fieri potest commodose.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: In isto cantico, eciam in ricmo sequenti, sanctus Johannes tenet gladium Symeonis deuotissime flexis genubus in manibus suis directe ante beatam virginem, cum quo tribus vicibus tangit pectus euis deuote.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.l: Symeonis grymmige swert,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Du byst my vnvorborghen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Du byst my lange vorbescherd,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Des mot ik sere sorgen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De sunne vorlust eren schyn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alder werld gemeyne,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De erde beuet, dar se licht,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ok klouen syk de steyne.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dot, kum, nym vns beyden,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ik nicht eyne

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Van em enscheyde

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So yamerliken!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Syn blot my nu rodet,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Syn dot my nu dodet,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Syn not my nu nodet

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt em ghelyke.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria dicit vlterius ad populum

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O gij saligen lute,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Schowet dessen groten yamer hute

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: An moder vnde an kynde!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Seet, wo rechte swynde

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Symeonis scharpe douendyge swert

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dorch myne sele henne verd

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ok dorch myn bedrouede herte!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Desse bytterlyke smerte

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Propheterede my her Symeon,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Do yk Jhesum Cristum mynen leuen so&esup;n

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: In den tempel godes brachte;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He sprak: o maget, nu wachte!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Du byst dynes modes nu so vro --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Id schal noch komen also,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat eyn scharp swert schal treden

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dorch dyne sele vnde dyn kynd dar mede!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria Johannis ewangeliste plangit post hoc et cantat

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O godes kynt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wo blodich synt

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alle de hilgen lede dyn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat gift myneme herten pyn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O du aller hogeste gud,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik nu sere beweynen mod

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dynen groten swaren dot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Owy vnde owe ouer vnsen not!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Gheleden heft den swaren dot

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jhesus Cristus, vnse leue here.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Leuen kyndere, helpet vns mede weynen sere!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Beter were wij vngeboren,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Worde syn hilge lydent an vns vorloren.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria cantat post hoc

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Fflecte ramos, arbor alta,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Densa laxa viscera,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Et rigor lentescat ille,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Quem dedit natiuitas,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vt superni membra regis

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Miti tendas stipite!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria dicit et inspicit crucem

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O du eddele bo&esup;m van hoger werde,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Boghe dy eyn kleyne to der erde,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat yk kussen moge den leuen sone myn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O wo drouych mot ik lange syn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ik synes nicht kan aflangen!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O leue kynt, wo hoge bystu nu ghehangen!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ny quam creature in so grote not,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alse du, Jhesu Criste, o hemmelsche got!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: We kan dy des danken, o ryke godes kynt?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Troste my vnde alle, de nu vmme dy bedrouet synt!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes respondet

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O eddele junckfrowe Maria vnde reyne maget,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dyn herteleyt sy gode van hemmelryke geklaget!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnse metelydent wyl sik nu ersten vornygen;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik mot myt luder stempnen vth mynem herten scrygen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ropen myt dy in den hemmel, o Marie!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Leuen vrundes, besuchtet vnde beweynet nu mede vnses heren dot,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat he juw behode vnde beware vor der ewygen helle no&esup;t!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Johannes cantat et vertit se ad Mariam virginem

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Maria, moder bystu myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jo byn ik de sone dyn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Cristus myn meyster dy my bevalen hat,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Went dyn heyl nu an myr stat.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So lat, trud moder, dyn weynent!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wo grot ys myn herteleyt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Went ik see des yamers kleyt

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: An der werden junckfrowen schynen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt so bytterlyken pynen!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wultu doden my enen?

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: God, here, meyster ys he myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Jo byn ik de junger syn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He gaf dy to ener moder my,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Do toch he my to sone dy,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De wyle he leuede an deme crutze.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vp synen brusten yk vntsleep,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn herte syne gotheyt grep:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik weyt, he ys van wyllen dot,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt wyllen let he de marter grot.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat nym an dyn herte, sute!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Sulken trost han nu van myr:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl wesen eyn hoder dyn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wente my bevalen bist,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde dyn heyl vorstoruen ist.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De prophecie ys vullenbracht:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He heft vorvullet des dodes macht.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt truwen yk dy meyne,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So lat, trut moder, dyn weynent!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Maria, medder vnde moder myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Och lat dyn grote weynent syn!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Herteleue benedygede maget,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Hebbe eyn herte vnvorsaghet,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wente yd mochte nicht anders syn:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dyn leue kynt moste lyden pyn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vor alle mynslyken kunne;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar na schal yd myt wunne

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vpstan van dode vnde myt vrowden dy schynen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde alle den leuen jungeren synen;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat schu&esup;t an deme drudden dage.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: -- Lat, moder maget, dyne klage! --

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar negest schal he ok to hemmel varen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myt synen groten hemmelschen scharen;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: In synes hemmelschen vaders trone

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Blyuet he ewychliken schone.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria respondet

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O Johannes, dat grote vnschuldige lydent syn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wundet so sere lijff vnde sele myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat yk mot weynen vnde scrygen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde kan des ok nicht vortygen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Planctus vltimus beate Marie, quem facit bina vice

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, nuwer sone myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik medder vnde moder dyn

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Bydde: help my weynen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde klagen Cristum den reynen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Synt weynent ys nu worden tijd!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dorch aller werlde myssedaet

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De hemmel an drofnissen stat,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Steyne, erde van vruchten stoten syk

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vmme Cristus do&esup;t so bytterlyk.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Grote swere an mynem herten lyt.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Maria post hoc dicit lacrimabiliter, vt sequitur

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O wy vnde we, dat ik gy wart gheboren!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik hebbe myn herteleue truten kynt vorloren!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ys my afgemordet ga&esup;r,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat hanget hijr bleek vnde do&esup;tva&esup;r!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Leuen kyndere, ik byn van jammer also krank,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat my benomen ys de ganck!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik mach nu nicht mer ga&esup;n,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ok nicht vp mynen voten sta&esup;n.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn herte wyl van yammer tobreken,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn munt mach ok nicht mer spreken.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, lose nu af den do&esup;k doch,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Den yk em vmme synen hylgen syden slo&esup;ch!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar ys ynne dat hilge dure blot,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat vte synen depen wunden vlot.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat mochte noch vp desser erden

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Mennigen mynschen to troste werden.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Hic Maria cadit ad terram præ nimio dolore, et Johannes soluit pannum leuansque matrem domini et dicit amicabiliter et consolatorie

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Sta vp, Maria, mynes herten allerleueste trut,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde troste doch dynen gar drouigen mot!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ys des mynschen salicheyt eyn grot deyl,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat gestoruen ys Jhesus Cristus, vnse gantze heyl.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De mynsche moste syn vorloren,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Were vnse leue here van dy nicht geboren;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vmme vns armen wolde he mynsche werden:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar to quam he vp erden

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Nach der propheten sproke allermeyst,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alse du suluen alderbest weyst.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He wolde den mynschen losen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vmme syne gude van der walt der bosen;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ok vmme syne groten barmherticheyt

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Heft he vordreuen vnse o&esup;lde leyt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat van vnsen ersten elderen quam,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alse vns de scrift secht, van Euen vnde van Adam.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat he den dot ok gy gewan,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Des scholen en louen sere vrowen vnde man.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Reyne junckfrowe Maria, lat dyne klaghe!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He wa&esup;rlik wyl vpsta&esup;n in deme drudden daghe:

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So schaltu en myt groten vrowden seen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Me&esup;r den mynslik herte kan denken vnde gheen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar an denke, o moder gute

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ga myt my an myne hute!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Du schalt wesen de leue moter myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl dy alle tijd vnderdanich vnde horsam syn;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: De junghere vnses heren scholen dat merken,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat ik dat bewysen wyl myt wyllen, myt worden vnde ok myt werken.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sancta Maria respondet voce lamcrimabili vltimo dicens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: Yohannes, myner leuen suster kynt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Wij altomale sere bedrouet synd,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Alse du wol west, vmme vnses leuen heren, mynes leuen kyndes do&esup;t.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Yk weyt dat wol, dat he desse marter grot

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Gheleden heft vor alle de werld gemeyne.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Hic vertit se ad filium

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O leue here Jhesu Criste, ik bevele my dy alleyne

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde sunte Johanse, deme leuen junghere dyn;

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: He mot nu vor dy myn kynt syn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Van weynende vnde van suchtende kan ik nicht mer spreken,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Myn arme herte wyl mydden entwey breken.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: O Jhesu Criste, mynes herten allerleueste kynt,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Troste vns vnde alle, de nu vmme dy bedrouet synt!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dyn hilge lydent mote vns syn to vromen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat wij altomale moten in dat ewyge leuent komen!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Johannes, leue truten sone myn,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik wyl dy to allen tyden horsam vnde vnderdanich syn.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Sanctus Johannes concludit post hoc planctum beate Marie virginis deuotissimum, dicens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.l: O leuen vrundes, gij hebben gehort an dessem guden dage

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnses heren lydent vnde vnser leuen vrowen klage!

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ere hilge lydent mote vns allen syn to vromen,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat wij altomale moten in dat ewyge leuent komen

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde myt Marien mogen in deme hemmelryke

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Beschowen Jhesum Cristum vnsen leuen heren ewychlyken.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dat vns dat altomale beschee,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: So stat vp vnde gat sytten vppe juwe beyde knee,

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Spreket eyn pater noster myt ynnicheyt

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Vnde ok aue Maria to juwer selen zalicheyt.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Ik bevele juw gode vnde sunte Marien.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.l: Dar mede wylle wij vnse klagent vortygen.

rdg.l: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Post hoc vnusquisque ponit se ad genua cum omnibus circumstantibus deuote, et sanctus Johannes dicit collectam sequentem alta voce pro omnibus: Oremus!

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Interueniat pro nobis quesumus, domine Jhesu Criste, nunc et in hora mortis nostre apud tuam immensam clemenciam beatissima virgo Maria, cuius felicissimam animam in hora amare passionis tue gladius doloris pertransiuit!

rdg.p: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Coniunctim

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Beati Johannis apostoli tui et ewangeliste nos quesumus tibi votiua commendat oracio.

rdg.p: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.p: cui moriens in cruce matrem virginem virgini commendasti.

rdg.p: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.p: Qui viuis et regnas cum deo patre in vnitate spiritus sancti, dues per omnia secula seculorum.

rdg.p: TRANSLATION OF SPOKEN LINE GOES HERE

lem.speaker: Omnes dicunt

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Amen.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Johannes ewangelista statim extendit manum suam et benedicens omnem populum cum eadem benedictione quam dicit sacerdos finito sermone.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Vltimo rector incipit psalmum "Tenebre face sunt", cum quo vadunt usque ad summum altare ordinate et deuote et simul omnes cantant vsque ad versum.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Quo finito omnes inclinant se ad gloriosissimum sacramentum humiliter.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Post hoc vnusquisque vadit vias cum gratiarum actione.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.speaker: Nota: Quando exeunt primo, cantant psalmum sequens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Circumdederunt me viri mendaces, sine causa flagellis ceciderunt me.

rdg.p: SONG TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Sed tu, domine defensor, vindica me!

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.speaker: Dominus Jhesus solus cantat versum

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Quoniam tribulacio proxima est et non est, qui adiuvet.

rdg.p: SONG TRANSLATION HERE

lem.speaker: Quando intrant, cantant responsorium sequens

rdg.speaker: TRANSLATION OF SPEAKER'S NAME GOES HERE

lem.p: Tenebre facte sunt, dum crucifixissent Jhesum Judei.

rdg.p: SONG TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Et circa horam nonam exclamauit Jhesus voce magna: Deus meus, Deus meus, vt quid me dereliquisti?

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Et inclinato capite tradidit spiritum.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE

lem.p: Et sic est finis huius planctus.

rdg.p: STAGE DIRECTION TRANSLATION HERE
